title: Blitz
body:
The Blitz map is a piece of art in disguise; the massively inflated models, crude placement of objects, poorly renamed starter items and disgusting recolored icons, and overall messy map design just makes me reminiscence about the good old days of Warcraft 3 & its custom maps. 

Imagine if we had a League of Legends map editor & custom games system like battle.net had back in those days. This game would have another decade of life and the lifetime value of consumers would absolutely SKYROCKET, while bringing enormous replay-ability and variety to more casual players.

replies.body: Not to mention the fact you could be B5 and someone be versing a 5 man team of challengers. What an art in disguise.
What does the design of the map have to do with the design of the matchmaking system? Absolutely nothing.
